description:
"this course outlined several webinar styles which allowed me to pick a format that not only was best for my product, but also fit my presenting and sales style. As a result we were able convert 21% of our webinar attendees into customers worth 5 figures in just our first webinar. I highly recommend this course." - Eliot D

Sign up today and receive access to 4 unique, high converting webinar blueprints you can use today.

====================================================================

Converting prospects and cold traffic is a TOUGH BUSINESS

Wasting countless hours figuring out the next marketing widget, while precious ad dollars are being flushed down the drain...

All while you're stuck trying to think of *what* it would take to get someone interested in your product or service.

Which is why Founder, Marketers, and Business Owners need to prepare by utilizing one of the most impactful and scalable marketing strategies currently available.

Here's the Good News

If you're up against the "big guys" on finding ways to gain and retain customers, clients or users... there's one strategy that scales better than almost any other option in the marketplace...

and that is Webinars

Webinars utilize that marketing secrets that companies like Apple use to build massive excitement, and leading startup companies like Hubspot, Leadpages, KISSMetrics, and more use to consistently bring in and convert leads.

Which is why I'm excited to present the complete blueprint for running webinars on your own.

Inside this course, we'll cover the psychological triggers and levers that make webinars so effective (in the education marketing and event based marketing section)

Then we'll do a deep dive into Four battle tested webinar formulas that you can deploy on your own. We'll cover the overview, then the exact "flow" of each one.

By the end of this course, you'll learn:

  • How to use advanced persuasion triggers to magnetically pull in new prospects
  • Specific, battle tested, webinar formulas that you can use to launch your first webinar
  • How to run your first, profitable webinar on your own

We'll also review best practices for high converting landing pages, running engaging webinars, and more.

This Price is a *limited* offer, so to reserve your price, sign up today!

To your success

David
title: Ultimate Webinar Blueprint for Startups & Entrepreneurs
